mapper.insert:
insert into goods ( goods_id, goods_sn, domain_id, goods_name, goods_brief, goods_desc, keywords, goods_img, goods_status, goods_number, warn_number, onsale_start_date, onsale_end_date, cat_id, add_time, last_update_time, user_id, attr_id, is_real, shop_price, seller_note, add_user) values
( (), #{item.goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goodsStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.goodsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.warnNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.onsaleStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.onsaleEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.catId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isReal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.shopPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.sellerNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
